name: Scavenge (kevindude6)
description:
Prototype game for GMTK Jam 2021.

WASD to move, left click to shoot. Scroll to zoom

Press space to enter build mode, where you can pick up floating pieces and attach them to your ship

Left click, Q,E in build mode. Right click to drop.

Space again to exit build mode.

R after your core has been destroyed to restart.

There are several problems, but it's not bad.
